item.description: Business Business > Case Studies 12 Startups in 12 Months Josh Schertz 12 Startups in 12 Months yongfook A Year of Making Is Done Apple, Samsung, and the Irrelevance of the American Smartphone Market Building and scaling Notion’s data lake From bootstrapped to a $425 million exit - The Trello story Here’s How I Bootstrapped a SaaS to $10k MRR - Bannerbear Here’s Why Firefox is Seeing a Continuous Decline for Last 12 Years How Ahrefs Gets a Billion Dollar-Worth Infrastructure With a 90% Discount | by Efim Mirochnik | May, 2024 | Ahrefs How Superhuman Grows - by Jaryd Hermann - How They Grow How an Ugly Single-Page Website Makes $5,000 a Month with Affiliate Marketing I’m Launching 12 Startups in 12 Months Laleh Khalili · In Clover: What does McKinsey do?...
